ygData.subject: Asteroid minig is not a safe carreer plan...

Subject: Asteroid minig is not a safe carreer plan...

From: "Nicolas Marion" <wingedwarrior41@...>

Starstomp:
Starstomp reporting sir.

Comm operator:
Yo babe, we got some trouble on the frequencies... We could have problems if 
ya still blow the bombs in 5 cycles...

Starstomp:
Roger that...
And shut yer scrappin' exhaust! If you dare to call me babe one more time, 
I'll blast you back to Cybertron!

The lady bot was tired of Electrod's constant and annoying tries at picking 
her up. But the frequency problem worried her. In the Jupiterian asteroid 
belt, there were not much outside sources that could interfere with the comm 
system of the Sledgehammer mining base.
But what could she do about it? The charges were in place and if they blew, 
she probably would have no damage at all, as deep as they were.

Starstomp:
Control, this is Pounder3, charges are in and ready to blow.

Then, they blew... And harder than they were supposed...

Electrod:
All units!! We are under attack! There's a Pred destroyer comin' right above 
us!!

Starstomp:
Slag it!! That last blast... it detached the whole spinward portion of the 
base!!

The un-blown part of the base was starting to derive...
But then, some unknown force came in...

(Vok 1):
Commence time-space warp...

The base vanished and reappeared crashing down in the plains at the feet of 
the Rockies of Earth's future north America.

Starstomp:
Control, do you read?

There were no answers, because the only parts of the base that had not 
disintegrated were the section were she stood and the cr and DNA scanning 
chambers...
The crash was hard, but she made it. A crater was created. She crawled to 
the chamber, not knowing were she was or even how she had gotten there. What 
she did know is that she was almost in stasis lock and that she needed to 
get a beast mode installed.

Starstomp:
Initiate DNA scanning, long-range... Contact the nearest technological 
facility, if any, with a peace and urgent help request. (This means the 
Chivtrons)

The computer soon found a beast mode, and the female robot embarked the CR 
chamber (or at least what could be left of it) and was fixed with her new 
beast mode. But there was a glitch. The remaining ateroid debries interfered 
with the DNA scanner. The result was a strange looking buffalo, seeming it 
had been carved out of a stone block.
